tickets.title: Document Helius API Integration Details
tickets.description: Extract and document the code snippets and endpoints used for Helius API calls within the repository. This involves locating the relevant source files and creating a clear summary of how the API is consumed.
acceptanceCriteria: Locate all source files making calls to the Helius API.
Extract code snippets demonstrating the request logic and parameters.
Ensure all API keys, secrets, and sensitive credentials are fully redacted.
Document the specific Helius endpoints and HTTP methods being utilized.
dependencies: Access to the repository source code

tickets.title: Generate Sample JSON Response for Token Data
tickets.description: Create a sample JSON object representing the fields currently retrieved for a token. This requires inspecting the data models or querying a live instance to ensure accuracy.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify the data structure or interface defining a token.
Generate a valid JSON sample populated with dummy data.
Verify if the token schema varies by type; if so, provide samples for each variation.
Ensure the sample includes all standard fields currently retrieved.
dependencies: Access to a live environment or test data
